name: Notes Management on Evil Tester
description:
Create a feature file called notesManagement.
  feature that tests the note management functionality.

  * Add 10 different notes with unique titles
  * Verify each note is added successfully
  * Assert that all notes appear in the application
  * Create appropriate step definitions
  * Run tests and confirm all notes are displayed correctly

elements.name: Add multiple notes and verify all are displayed

cells: Milk, eggs, bread, spinach, chicken breast, peanut butter. Don't forget the dog food!
Decided on the blue color palette. Target launch date moved to Q4. Sarah will handle social media graphics.
Hiking at Bear Mountain, visit the new bookstore downtown, try that new ramen place, finish painting the guest room.
kja83ndhT47vBcZ90qLpA6wXrS2uEyD8gI5fO1hJ3mK4 (For testing only - never store real sensitive keys here!)
'The Martian' by Andy Weir. Fast-paced and scientifically interesting. Check the library for availability.
Oil change at 85,000 miles. Tire rotation due in 3,000 miles. Replaced wiper blades on 9/28/2025.
Add a dark mode toggle to the user profile settings. Need to test accessibility compliance for the new theme.
'The only way to do great work is to love what you do.' - Steve Jobs. A good reminder for Monday mornings.
Boil water, cook pasta (8 mins), saut√© garlic in olive oil, toss pasta with sauce, top with basil and Parmesan.
Why is the sky blue? Need to look up how to prune roses. Schedule a dentist appointment for next month.

steps.name: all notes should be visible in the list
